name: XXNetworkHelper
summary: XXNetworkHelper is a lightweight, chainable Objective-C HTTP networking wrapper based on NSURLSession, designed for simplicity, performance, and modern iOS practices.
description: XXNetworkHelper is a lightweight and extensible Objective-C networking utility built on top of NSURLSession. It simplifies the process of making HTTP requests by providing a clean and chainable API, while offering flexible configuration, request/response interceptors, and detailed logging. Designed for modern iOS development, it supports JSON requests, file uploads, automatic retry logic, network reachability integration, and more..
